answers.answer: I haven't started losing my mucus plug to my knowledge anyway. I did feel some contractions two days ago but it may have been due to constipation. I'm due January 10th.

Im due jan 28th and ive been having braxton hicks for a few weeks already, havent lost my mucous plug, but I would be just ss concerned as you had I lost it. My first pregnancy was so textbook, everything happened when it seemed it was supposed to, and I never had even the slightest contraction until I went into labor.  So these BH are unsettling.. Although, this entire pregnancy this time around has been a challenge.  What has your doc said about this?

I'm only 30 weeks and 4 days ftm due January 11th and I've been loosing mine to andupdateh what my doctor said is real contractions it's scary I never know what to think plus I'm also going into preeclampsia So it makes all this stress even worse. Just talk to your doctor and keep him/her updated! You'll be okay it's pretty normal cause you only have about 9 weeks left :)

question: I have been losing my.mucus plug for the past 4 weeks so this on set of braxton hicks at night scare the living daylights out of me. I am a first time mom due January 9th. All the other ladies around me are older and their children are grown. So, when I express my nervousness and concerns they all look at me like I am am over reacting. Anyone else experience these things being only 30 weeks? I thought it was to early to be losing the mucus plug and having braxton hicks...
title: braxton hicks make anyone else nervous?
